attributes.action: i want all meat products ,to be labeled halal or none halal.by supermarkets
attributes.background: i would like all shops and supermarkets to show who is selling halal meat ,i am opposed to this sort of meat ,and i am sure a lot of other people would be as well if they knew what they were eating

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:  
 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105962
 
You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
